articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of State of Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of State of Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to heads of state of foreign countries in reply to their congratulatory messages on the occasion of the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The addressees included Myanmar President Thein Sein, Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad, Nigerian President and Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces Goodluck Ebele Jonathan and Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. 
					
					 In the messages Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks to them for their congratulatory messages on the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the relevant countries would grow stronger in the common interests, he wished the presidents successes in their work for the stability of the countries and social development.

articles.title: Laws Amended in DPRK
articles.content:
Laws Amended in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK recently amended and supplemented some articles of the Law on Work Norms and the Law on Road Traffic.
					 The amendment and supplementation of those laws are of great significance in improving work in the fields of work norms and road traffic as required by the reality.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Republic of Ireland
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Republic of Ireland
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a message of greeting to Micheal Higgins, president of the Republic of Ireland, on its national day.
					 The message expressed the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger.

articles.title: SPA Chairman Meets New Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Meets New Russian Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA), met and had a talk with Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Havana
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Havana
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong arrived in Havana on Mar. 15 to visit the Republic of Cuba.

articles.title: Mexican Party Leader Supports WPK's Policies and Measures
articles.content:
Mexican Party Leader Supports WPK's Policies and Measures
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea attending the 19th seminar of political parties of the world on building a new society held in Mexico had a talk with Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on March 12.
					 The national leader highly praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for founding and leading the Workers' Party of Korea to victory and thus protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and laying a strong foundation for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The WPK and the people of the DPRK have achieved successes in the drive for hastening the final victory despite the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces. This is ascribable to the outstanding leadership of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He referred to the fact that an appeal to the communist parties, workers' parties and other progressive political parties and the people of the world calling for splendidly celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the WPK was adopted at the seminar. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Mexico will as ever fully support all the policies and measures of the WPK for the independent reunification of Korea and the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Brisk Information Service and Tele-education at Grand People's Study House
articles.content:
Brisk Information Service and Tele-education at Grand People's Study House
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Grand People's Study House in the DPRK is proving successful in giving information service and tele-education.
					At least 120,000 latest scientific and technological achievements have been added to its data base since the outset of the year.
					
					 It is providing hundreds of pieces of scientific and technological information every day to subscribers under a well-regulated system connected with libraries and science and technology knowledge dissemination rooms at industrial establishments and co-operative farms.
					
					 Officials and researchers of the Study House visited major units and constructions sites to disseminate thousands of pieces of valuable sci-tech information this year.
					
					 The tele-education is proving effective in helping officials and other working people quickly acquire advanced science and technology and settle scientific and technological issues.
					
					 The number of those who wish to receive tele-lectures on the global trend of sci-tech development and sci-tech knowledge in various fields is on the steady increase.
					
					 Tele-workshops on agriculture, stockbreeding and fish breeding are drawing particular attention of the audience.

articles.title: Efforts Paid to Improving Education
articles.content:
Efforts Paid to Improving Education
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Universities of education in the DPRK have concentrated efforts on improving education and putting it on an IT basis.
					 Kim Hyong Jik University of Education is now taking the lead in the work. 
					
					 The university has developed various educational aid programs to apply them to universities of education and schools throughout the country.
					
					 The university has made full preparations for giving tele-education to universities of education and teacher training colleges.
					
					 The Education Faculty of the university is pushing ahead with a prospective plan to raise the standard of education to a world level.
					
					 Teachers are giving priority to heuristic method of education, Kim Yong Chol, dean of the faculty, told KCNA, adding that they are also paying great efforts to helping students to assimilate what they have learned at lessons.

articles.title: Campaign for Afforestation Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Campaign for Afforestation Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- People of the DPRK have turned out in the forest restoration campaign.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kim Song Jun, vice director-general of the General Bureau of Forest under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made public the work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" on the threshold of the Tree Planting Day (March 2).
					
					 In hearty response to the call he made in the work, all the people have turned out in the campaign.
					
					 Flood and drought damages which have hit the country in recent years are attributable to naked mountains. Therefore, the forest restoration brooks no further delay in the country.
					
					 Preferential efforts are being paid to cultivating saplings in every province, city and county and many nurseries have put the cultivation of saplings on an industrial basis. 
					
					 Trees are planted with much care not only on mountains and roadsides but also in the vicinity of villages and railroads.

articles.title: Koryo Insam, Specialty of Kaesong
articles.content:
Koryo Insam, Specialty of Kaesong
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Koryo Insam (ginseng), a specialty of Kaesong, the DPRK, is well known over the world for its high medicinal effect.
					 It is believed that Insam began to be exported to other countries from the period of Koryo Kingdom (918-1392).
					
					 The soil, water and weather in Kaesong area are favorable for cultivating Insam.
					
					 Insam is abundant in glucosides, amino acid, vitamins and microelements.
					
					 Among Insam products are tea, extract, liquor and jelly.
					
					 Cosmetics, made from Insam, are very popular at home and abroad.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Censures "Human Scum Who Defected from North"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Censures "Human Scum Who Defected from North"
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The "defectors from the north" are human scum who betrayed the country and its people and abandoned even elementary conscience and moral obligation as human being. They are taking the lead in the anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					 It is a sin for anyone to flee the motherland that brought up and took care of him. It is the thrice-cursed crime to speak ill of the motherland by cooking up sheer lies for a petty amount of money. 
					
					 One of those betes noires is Choe Ju Hwal who is going reckless with the campaign as chairman of the "Fellowship Society of Defectors from the North" in south Korea.
					
					 As far as he is concerned, he lost his father at the hands of U.S. imperialists and class enemies during the Korean war. 
					
					 The country, therefore, brought him up with deep loving care. He was obliged to live up to this benevolence. 
					
					 However, he is serving the enemies who killed his father. Can a human being behave so ungratefully?
					
					 Whoever is blinded with money-making does not hesitate to perpetrate such acts that make brutes blush. 
					
					 Working in the trade field in the past, Choe embezzled state funds to lead a degenerate life. He committed lots of unpardonable illegal acts in pursuit of money and luxury.
					
					 Afraid of the disclosure of his crimes, he abandoned his mother, wife and two children and ran away while overseas business tour. Then he found himself in a cesspool of crimes.
					
					 He was engrossed again in swindles to earn money just as other "defectors from the north" make no scruple of making money.
					
					 He has been hired by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces to groundlessly slander the socialist system in the DPRK and has zealously taken part in heinous hostile acts against it.
					
					 Great irony is that the hostile forces are dreaming of stamping out the ideology of the DPRK and bringing down its social system by paying a petty amount of money to those worse than animals who betrayed the country which brought up them and put forward them, abandoned their wives and children and unhesitatingly colluded with the enemies who killed their fathers for the sake of the money.
					
					 No matter what infamy such human scum as Choe stoop to, they can neither conceal their ugly true colors nor seek a way out.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Discloses True Colors of Representative of Anti-DPRK Internet Paper
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Discloses True Colors of Representative of Anti-DPRK Internet Paper
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- All "defectors from the north" are betes noires bereft of elementary dignity as human beings as they serve the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities in their anti-DPRK smear campaigns for a petty amount of money paid by them. 
					 As already reported, Jang Jin Song claiming to be representative of the internet paper New Focus is a habitual criminal who is steeped in immorality to the marrow of his bones. 
					
					 Thanks to the benevolence of the socialist system of the DPRK, Jang graduated from Pyongyang University of Music and Dance. However, he did not work well but habitually made sexual abuses against women to be detained for 13 times. 
					
					 He continued leading a corrupt and degenerated life to be a target of social criticism. He was so lewd and depraved guy that even his mother-in-law, wife and all others did not treat him as a human being. 
					
					 He embezzled other people's money and goods with sheer lies and frauds and even illegally obtained state properties. 
					
					 He fled the country and his family and changed his name in a bid to eke out his living. He now dares take the lead in the smear campaign against the DPRK, fearing no punishment from Heaven. 
					
					 Such despicable guys and traitors as Jang adding to his crimes deserve severe punishment. They are doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits. 
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, for the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to seek to hurt the DPRK by bringing together such dregs of society and tricksters.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Anti-"government" Leaflet Scattering actions in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Anti-"government" Leaflet Scattering actions in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The leaflet scattering actions against the regime now going on in various parts of south Korea are a manifestation of the bitter resentment of the people at the present chief executive, who runs the whole gamut of crimes against the people, gimmicks, deception and mockery of the people, and sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with the compatriots. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a commentary.
					 Two years have passed since the present regime came to power in south Korea, but those days have been a period of nightmare in which the south Korean people had to suffer shame and misfortune with their grudge and resentment unsettled.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive promised the south Korean people "an era of people's happiness" when coming to power, but what she has brought them was only misfortune and despair.
					
					 Those who praise the north and call for reunification are arrested after being labeled "followers of the north" under the revived harsh "yusin" dictatorship and suicide rate is the highest in the world due to the worst destitution of people's living. This is the true picture of the south Korean society.
					
					 People's mindset represents the will of Heaven.
					
					 It is a matter of time that the people's leaflet scattering actions against the regime may develop into fierce resistance for making a clean sweep of the regime of traitors.
					
					 The group of traitors going against the will and demands of the people is bound to face punishment by Heaven. 
					
					 If the puppet group desperately persists in the anachronistic fascist dictatorial rule and racket for confrontation with the DPRK, it will certainly meet a miserable end just as their predecessors did.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Improving People's Living Standard
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Improving People's Living Standard
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for further improving the people's living standard with agricultural production, animal husbandry and fishing as the main thrusts.
					 The Workers' Party of Korea's idea on improving the people's living standard with the above-said thrusts is a scientific and revolutionary one, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the WPK's intention to make hurrah for the WPK and socialism heard from the dinner table of every family.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces are working hard to put political and military pressure on the DPRK and apply economic sanctions and blockade against it. Their ulterior purpose is to shake people's faith in socialism and bring down the social system in the DPRK at any cost by causing acute shortage of food and destitution.
					
					 The DPRK has solid material and technological foundations for improving the people's living standard laid by leader Kim Jong Il while making high-intensity forced march till the last moments of his life. It has also a wealth of experience gained in increasing grain production by its own efforts under difficult situation and unfavorable conditions. Last year the fishery field of the Korean People's Army proved in practice that fishes are abundant in the seas of Korea and a radical turn can be made in fishing.
					
					 The editorial calls on all officials and working people in the fields of agriculture, animal husbandry and fishing to turn out as one in the drive to carry out the tasks set forth by the WPK.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Media under Fire
articles.content:
South Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Media under Fire
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The committee for founding and developing Jaju Ilbo of south Korea and its staff members held a press conference before the Seoul City Office on Mar. 5 to denounce the puppet conservative group's suppression of media. 
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the Seoul City Office of taking such fascist action as imposing three month suspension of publication on Jaju Ilbo, successor to the internet paper Jaju Minbo, in the wake of a final decision made by the supreme court to shut down it.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" and other conservative groups worked hard to shut down Jaju Minbo and pressurized the mayor of Seoul to cancel the registration of Jaju Ilbo and suspend its publication, they noted.
					
					 They deplored that they couldn't say there are democracy and human rights in south Korea where no freedom of speech and expression is guaranteed.
					
					 They called upon the progressive forces to turn out in the struggle against the authorities' acts of stamping out the freedom of expression.
					
					 Then a statement was made public. 
					
					 The present conservative ruling forces will not hold in check the activities of progressive media for independence, democracy, reunification and people's livelihood, the statement said.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Thailand
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed at Rajabat Pranakorn University on March 6.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange colorful political and cultural events including a seminar, lecture and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Romania
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 10.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including a meeting, seminar, lecture and photo exhibition to praise the sacred revolutionary career and exploits of the President from March 20 to April 15.

articles.title: Brazilian Political Personage Praises Korean People's Achievements
articles.content:
Brazilian Political Personage Praises Korean People's Achievements
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The organizational secretary of the Espirito Santo State Committee of the Communist Party of Brazil expressed his impressions of his visit to the DPRK, when interviewed by an internet paper on Mar. 3.
					 Noting that he saw and felt a lot during his visit to the DPRK in July last year, he praised the Korean people for having achieved great successes in socialist construction under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was deeply moved to see the service personnel and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the final victory, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un at the top post of the revolution.
					
					 Political rights of the popular masses are successfully guaranteed and such social policies as free education and free health care are in force in the DPRK, he added.

articles.title: Enmendadas leyes en la RPDC
articles.content:
Enmendadas leyes en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enmendo y suplemento algunos articulos de la ley de normas de trabajo y la de trafico en carreteras.
					Los articulos modificados de la primera son 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 21, 23, 24 y 32 y los de la segunda son 61, 65, 82 y 87.
					
					La enmienda tiene mucha importancia en mejorar e intensificar sin parar las labores de los respectivos sectores segun la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo.
					
					Actualmente, las unidades correspondientes se esmeran en la ejecucion de articulos cambiados.

articles.title: Llega a La Habana delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
articles.content:
Llega a La Habana delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el canciller Ri Su Yong, llego el dia 15 a La Habana para realizar una visita a la Republica de Cuba.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador ruso
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador ruso 
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio el dia 16 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Federacion Rusa en Corea,  Alexandr Matsegora, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: RPDC revela naturaleza de escoria humana
articles.content:
RPDC revela naturaleza de escoria humana
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los "fugitivos norcoreanos" que se hicieron lacayos de las maniobras hostiles anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sobornados con algunos dineros de Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos, son las escorias humanas carentes de elementales rasgos de los seres humanos.
					Como ya se ha revelado, Jang Jin Song, representante del periodico online New Focus, medio de propaganda tendenciosa anti-RPDC, es tambien el delincuente habitual a la inmoralidad.
					
					Jang se graduo de la Universidad de Musica y Danza de Pyongyang (en aquel entonces) bajo la solicitud del regimen socialista de nuestro pais, pero no hizo merecidamente su trabajo encargado y fue arrestado 13 veces por el organo de seguridad, por haber cometido habitualmente los actos de violacion sexual.
					
					Por tal motivo, fue objeto de censura de la sociedad y repudiado hasta por su suegra y  esposa.
					
					Tambien fue criminal quien saqueo con mentiras y fraudes el dinero y otras cosas de otras personas y estafo hasta los bienes estatales.
					
					Despues de huir traicionando a su patria y familia, cambio su nombre y apellido y se pone a la cabeza de las maniobras de fraudes y conspiracion contra la RPDC para sostener su  sucia vida.
					
					Jang Jin Song y otras escorias humanas, que agrandan sus crimenes, merecen ser castigado severamente y no evitaran su destino de desamparada alma.
					
					Es muy pobre la conducta de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que suenan con atentar a alguien con un punado de estafadores.

articles.title: Choe Ju Hwal y otras escorias humanas no pueden ocultar su sucio atributo
articles.content:
Choe Ju Hwal y otras escorias humanas no pueden ocultar su sucio atributo
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ahora, las escorias humanas, quienes traicionaron a la patria y al pueblo despreciando la conciencia y la obligacion moral del ser humano, toman parte activa en la campana anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Entre esos elementos conocidos como "fugitivos norcoreanos" figura Choe Ju Hwal, presidente de la llamada "Asociacion de los Camaradas Fugitivos Norcoreanos".
					
					El padre de Choe fue matado por el imperialismo norteamericano y los enemigos de clase durante el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC atendio con calido amor a los familiares de los asesinados por los enemigos en el tiempo de guerra.
					
					Lejos de recompensar esas benevolencias, Choe huyo al lado de enemigos que mataron a su padre. 
					
					En este mundo no habria otro tipejo tan corrupto y malagradecido como Choe.
					
					El es delincuente habitual quien trabajando en la rama de comercio exterior, desfalco hasta los fondos publicos para su vida corrupta y suntuosa, entre otros delitos.
					
					Por el temor a la revelacion de sus crimenes, aprovecho el viaje de trabajo al extranjero para huir al Sur de Corea abandonando a su madre, esposa y dos hijos.
					
					Para ganar dinero, comenzo otra vez en el Sur de Corea la vida de estafador.
					
					Siguiendo a Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos, dijo disparates para calumniar el regimen socialista de la RPDC y tergiversar la realidad de esta y se incorporo a los actos hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					Es ridiculo el intento de las fuerzas enemigas de suprimir la idea y el regimen de la RPDC movilizando a las escorias humanas como Choe.
					
					Choe y otras escorias humanas como el no podran ocultar nunca su sucia naturaleza ni buscar su escondite en este mundo.
